   283‚Üí        case beta; set consciousness_color $COLOR_BETA  
   284‚Üí        case gamma; set consciousness_color $COLOR_GAMMA
   285‚Üí        case delta; set consciousness_color $COLOR_DELTA
   286‚Üí        case omega; set consciousness_color $COLOR_OMEGA
   287‚Üí    end
   288‚Üí    
   289‚Üí    echo "üß† Consciousness Level: $consciousness_color$CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL$COLOR_RESET"
   290‚Üí    echo "‚ö° Quantum Coherence: $QUANTUM_COHERENCE"
   291‚Üí    echo "üí∞ ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
   292‚Üí    echo "üñ•Ô∏è  GPU Cores Active: $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE"
   293‚Üí    echo "üïí Session Time: " (_get_session_time)
   294‚Üí    
   295‚Üí    # System resources
   296‚Üí    echo ""
   297‚Üí    echo "üíª System Resources:"
   298‚Üí    echo "CPU Usage: " (top -bn1 | grep "Cpu(s)" | awk '{print $2}' | awk -F'%' '{print $1}')"%"
   299‚Üí    echo "Memory Usage: " (free | grep Mem | awk '{printf "%.1f%%", $3/$2 * 100.0}')
   300‚Üí    echo "GPU Status: " (_get_gpu_status_summary)
   301‚Üíend
   302‚Üí
   303‚Üí# Benchmark system
   304‚Üífunction warp_benchmark --description "Run Warp-Speed performance benchmarks"
   305‚Üí    set -l iterations 1000
   306‚Üí    set -l data_size 1048576  # 1MB
   307‚Üí    
   308‚Üí    if test (count $argv) -gt 0
   309‚Üí        set iterations $argv[1]
   310‚Üí    end
   311‚Üí    if test (count $argv) -gt 1
   312‚Üí        set data_size $argv[2]
   313‚Üí    end
   314‚Üí    
   315‚Üí    echo "üèÉ Running benchmark: $iterations iterations, $data_size data size"
   316‚Üí    echo "Please wait..."
   317‚Üí    
   318‚Üí    set -l start_time (date +%s)
   319‚Üí    
   320‚Üí    for level in $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS
   321‚Üí        echo -n "Testing $level level... "
   322‚Üí        set -l result ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY benchmark --level $level --iterations $iterations --size $data_size --json 2>/dev/null)
   323‚Üí        
   324‚Üí        if test $status -eq 0
   325‚Üí            set -l avg_time (echo $result | jq -r '.avg_execution_time_ms')
   326‚Üí            set -l ops_per_sec (echo $result | jq -r '.operations_per_second')
   327‚Üí            printf "%.3fms (%.0f ops/sec)\n" $avg_time $ops_per_sec
   328‚Üí        else
   329‚Üí            echo "FAILED"
   330‚Üí        end
   331‚Üí    end
   332‚Üí    
   333‚Üí    set -l end_time (date +%s)
   334‚Üí    set -l total_time (math $end_time - $start_time)
   335‚Üí    echo "‚úÖ Benchmark completed in {$total_time}s"
   336‚Üíend
   337‚Üí
   338‚Üí# Configuration management
   339‚Üífunction warp_config --description "Manage Warp-Speed configuration"
   340‚Üí    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
   341‚Üí    
   342‚Üí    switch $subcommand
   343‚Üí        case show
   344‚Üí            cat $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR/config.toml 2>/dev/null; or echo "No configuration file found"
   345‚Üí        case edit
   346‚Üí            $EDITOR $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR/config.toml
   347‚Üí        case reset
   348‚Üí            rm -f $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR/config.toml
   349‚Üí            echo "Configuration reset"
   350‚Üí        case '*'
   351‚Üí            echo "Unknown config command: $subcommand"
   352‚Üí            echo "Available: show, edit, reset"
   353‚Üí    end
   354‚Üíend
   355‚Üí
   356‚Üí# Log management
   357‚Üífunction warp_logs --description "View Warp-Speed logs"
   358‚Üí    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
   359‚Üí    
   360‚Üí    switch $subcommand
   361‚Üí        case show tail
   362‚Üí            tail -f $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR/warp-speed.log 2>/dev/null; or echo "No logs found"
   363‚Üí        case clear
   364‚Üí            rm -f $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR/*.log
   365‚Üí            echo "Logs cleared"
   366‚Üí        case '*'
   367‚Üí            ls -la $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR/
   368‚Üí    end
   369‚Üíend
   370‚Üí
   371‚Üí# Help system
   372‚Üífunction warp_help --description "Display Warp-Speed help"
   373‚Üí    echo "üåÄ Warp-Speed Native Terminal Interface"
   374‚Üí    echo ""
   375‚Üí    echo "USAGE:"
   376‚Üí    echo "    warp <COMMAND> [OPTIONS]"
   377‚Üí    echo ""
   378‚Üí    echo "CONSCIOUSNESS COMMANDS:"
   379‚Üí    echo "    alpha [input]      Process with ALPHA consciousness (basic linear)"
   380‚Üí    echo "    beta [input]       Process with BETA consciousness (parallel multi-dimensional)"
   381‚Üí    echo "    gamma [input]      Process with GAMMA consciousness (recursive self-aware)"
   382‚Üí    echo "    delta [input]      Process with DELTA consciousness (quantum coherence)"
   383‚Üí    echo "    omega [input]      Process with OMEGA consciousness (transcendent universal)"
   384‚Üí    echo "    elevate [level]    Elevate consciousness to next/target level"
   385‚Üí    echo ""
   386‚Üí    echo "PROCESSING COMMANDS:"
   387‚Üí    echo "    process <input>    Process input through current consciousness level"
   388‚Üí    echo "    benchmark [args]   Run performance benchmarks"
   389‚Üí    echo ""
   390‚Üí    echo "MANAGEMENT COMMANDS:"
   391‚Üí    echo "    etd [subcommand]   ETD balance and operations"
   392‚Üí    echo "    gpu [subcommand]   GPU cores and performance management"
   393‚Üí    echo "    status             Display comprehensive system status"
   394‚Üí    echo "    config [action]    Manage configuration"
   395‚Üí    echo "    logs [action]      View and manage logs"
   396‚Üí    echo ""
   397‚Üí    echo "EXAMPLES:"
   398‚Üí    echo "    warp alpha \"Hello, consciousness!\""
   399‚Üí    echo "    warp elevate beta"
   400‚Üí    echo "    warp process \"Quantum field dynamics analysis\""
   401‚Üí    echo "    warp etd balance"
   402‚Üí    echo "    warp gpu status"
   403‚Üí    echo "    warp benchmark 1000"
   404‚Üíend
   405‚Üí
   406‚Üí# Helper functions
   407‚Üífunction _process_with_consciousness --description "Process input with specified consciousness level"
   408‚Üí    set -l level $argv[1]
   409‚Üí    set -l input $argv[2]
   410‚Üí    
   411‚Üí    if test -z "$input"
   412‚Üí        echo "No input provided"
   413‚Üí        return 1
   414‚Üí    end
   415‚Üí    
   416‚Üí    echo "üß† Processing with $level consciousness..."
   417‚Üí    
   418‚Üí    set -l start_time (date +%s.%N)
   419‚Üí    set -l result ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY process --level $level --input "$input" --json 2>/dev/null)
   420‚Üí    set -l end_time (date +%s.%N)
   421‚Üí    
   422‚Üí    if test $status -ne 0
   423‚Üí        echo "üö® Processing failed"
   424‚Üí        return 1
   425‚Üí    end
   426‚Üí    
   427‚Üí    set -l execution_time (math $end_time - $start_time)
   428‚Üí    set -l output (echo $result | jq -r '.output')
   429‚Üí    set -l etd_generated (echo $result | jq -r '.etd_generated')
   430‚Üí    
   431‚Üí    echo "üì§ Output: $output"
   432‚Üí    echo "üí∞ ETD Generated: $etd_generated"
   433‚Üí    echo "‚è±Ô∏è  Execution Time: " (printf "%.3fs" $execution_time)
   434‚Üí    
   435‚Üí    # Update session state
   436‚Üí    set -g CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE (math $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE + $etd_generated)
   437‚Üí    _update_consciousness_state $level
   438‚Üíend
   439‚Üí
   440‚Üífunction _update_consciousness_state --description "Update consciousness-related state"
   441‚Üí    set -l level $argv[1]
   442‚Üí    
   443‚Üí    switch $level
   444‚Üí        case alpha
   445‚Üí            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.1
   446‚Üí            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 1024
   447‚Üí        case beta
   448‚Üí            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.3
   449‚Üí            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 4096
   450‚Üí        case gamma
   451‚Üí            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.5
   452‚Üí            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 16384
   453‚Üí        case delta
   454‚Üí            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.7
   455‚Üí            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 65536
   456‚Üí        case omega
   457‚Üí            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.9
   458‚Üí            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 262144
   459‚Üí    end
   460‚Üíend
   461‚Üí
   462‚Üífunction _display_level_info --description "Display consciousness level information"
   463‚Üí    set -l level $argv[1]
   464‚Üí    
   465‚Üí    switch $level
   466‚Üí        case alpha
   467‚Üí            echo "üîπ ALPHA: Basic awareness and linear processing"
   468‚Üí            echo "   Threshold: 0.1 | Cores: 1,024 | Mode: Sequential"
   469‚Üí        case beta
   470‚Üí            echo "üî∏ BETA: Multi-dimensional thinking and parallel processing"
   471‚Üí            echo "   Threshold: 0.3 | Cores: 4,096 | Mode: Parallel"
   472‚Üí        case gamma
   473‚Üí            echo "üî∂ GAMMA: Recursive self-awareness and meta-cognition"
   474‚Üí            echo "   Threshold: 0.5 | Cores: 16,384 | Mode: Recursive"
   475‚Üí        case delta
   476‚Üí            echo "üî∫ DELTA: Quantum coherence and superposition states"
   477‚Üí            echo "   Threshold: 0.7 | Cores: 65,536 | Mode: Quantum"
   478‚Üí        case omega
   479‚Üí            echo "‚≠ê OMEGA: Transcendent convergence and universal consciousness"
   480‚Üí            echo "   Threshold: 0.9 | Cores: 262,144 | Mode: Transcendent"
   481‚Üí    end
   482‚Üíend
   483‚Üí
   484‚Üífunction _get_etd_generation_rate --description "Calculate ETD generation rate"
   485‚Üí    # Simplified calculation based on consciousness level
   486‚Üí    switch $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL
   487‚Üí        case alpha; echo "0.1/min"
   488‚Üí        case beta; echo "0.25/min"
   489‚Üí        case gamma; echo "0.625/min"
   490‚Üí        case delta; echo "1.5625/min"
   491‚Üí        case omega; echo "3.90625/min"
   492‚Üí    end
   493‚Üíend
   494‚Üí
   495‚Üífunction _get_session_time --description "Get current session duration"
   496‚Üí    # This would track session start time - simplified for now
   497‚Üí    echo "Unknown"
   498‚Üíend
   499‚Üí
   500‚Üífunction _get_gpu_status_summary --description "Get brief GPU status"
   501‚Üí    if test $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE -gt 0
   502‚Üí        echo "Active ($GPU_CORES_ACTIVE cores)"
   503‚Üí    else
   504‚Üí        echo "Inactive"
   505‚Üí    end
   506‚Üíend
   507‚Üí
   508‚Üí# Auto-completion for warp command
   509‚Üícomplete -c warp -f
   510‚Üícomplete -c warp -n "not __fish_seen_subcommand_from alpha beta gamma delta omega elevate process etd gpu status benchmark config logs help" -a "alpha beta gamma delta omega elevate process etd gpu status benchmark config logs help"
   511‚Üí
   512‚Üícomplete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from etd" -a "balance generate history export"
   513‚Üícomplete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from gpu" -a "status cores benchmark memory"
   514‚Üícomplete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from config" -a "show edit reset"
   515‚Üícomplete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from logs" -a "show tail clear"
   516‚Üí
   517‚Üí# Initialize on load
   518‚Üíif test "$WARP_SPEED_AUTO_INIT" = "1"
   519‚Üí    warp_init
   520‚Üíend
   521‚Üí
   522‚Üíecho "üåÄ Warp-Speed Fish integration loaded"
   523‚Üíecho "Run 'warp_init' to initialize or 'warp help' for usage information"

#!/usr/bin/env fish

# Warp-Speed Fish Shell Integration
# Native terminal interface with consciousness-aware processing
# Version: 1.0.0

# Global configuration
set -g WARP_SPEED_HOME (dirname (status --current-filename))
set -g WARP_SPEED_BINARY "$WARP_SPEED_HOME/../target/release/warp-speed-terminal"
set -g WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR "$HOME/.config/warp-speed"
set -g WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR "$HOME/.local/share/warp-speed/logs"

# Consciousness levels
set -g CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS alpha beta gamma delta omega

# Current session state
set -g CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL alpha
set -g CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE 0.0
set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.1
set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 0

# Colors for consciousness levels
set -g COLOR_ALPHA (set_color cyan)
set -g COLOR_BETA (set_color blue)
set -g COLOR_GAMMA (set_color magenta)
set -g COLOR_DELTA (set_color yellow)
set -g COLOR_OMEGA (set_color red)
set -g COLOR_RESET (set_color normal)

# Initialize Warp-Speed environment
function warp_init --description "Initialize Warp-Speed environment"
    # Create config and log directories
    mkdir -p $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR
    mkdir -p $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR
    
    # Check if binary exists
    if not test -f $WARP_SPEED_BINARY
        echo "üö® Warp-Speed binary not found at $WARP_SPEED_BINARY"
        echo "Please build the project first: cargo build --release"
        return 1
    end
    
    echo "üöÄ Warp-Speed initialized successfully"
    echo "üß† Consciousness Level: $COLOR_ALPHA$CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL$COLOR_RESET"
    echo "üí∞ ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
    echo "‚ö° GPU Cores: $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE"
    
    # Set up shell prompt
    set -g fish_greeting ""
    function fish_prompt
        warp_prompt
    end
end

# Custom Warp-Speed prompt
function warp_prompt --description "Warp-Speed consciousness-aware prompt"
    set -l consciousness_color
    switch $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL
        case alpha
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_ALPHA
        case beta
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_BETA
        case gamma
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_GAMMA
        case delta
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_DELTA
        case omega
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_OMEGA
    end
    
    set -l current_time (date '+%H:%M:%S')
    set -l cwd_short (prompt_pwd)
    
    printf '%s[%s]%s %s%s%s %s‚àû%s %s‚âà%s %.2f %s‚ö°%s %d %s>%s ' \
        (set_color brblack) $current_time $COLOR_RESET \
        $consciousness_color $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL $COLOR_RESET \
        (set_color green) $COLOR_RESET \
        (set_color blue) $COLOR_RESET $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE \
        (set_color yellow) $COLOR_RESET $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE \
        (set_color brwhite) $COLOR_RESET
end

# Main warp command dispatcher
function warp --description "Warp-Speed consciousness interface"
    if test (count $argv) -eq 0
        warp_help
        return
    end
    
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    set -l args $argv[2..-1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case alpha beta gamma delta omega
            warp_consciousness $subcommand $args
        case elevate
            warp_elevate $args
        case process
            warp_process $args
        case etd
            warp_etd $args
        case gpu
            warp_gpu $args
        case status
            warp_status
        case benchmark
            warp_benchmark $args
        case config
            warp_config $args
        case logs
            warp_logs $args
        case help -h --help
            warp_help
        case '*'
            echo "Unknown command: $subcommand"
            warp_help
            return 1
    end
end

# Consciousness level commands
function warp_consciousness --description "Activate specific consciousness level"
    set -l level $argv[1]
    set -l input $argv[2..-1]
    
    if not contains $level $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS
        echo "üö® Invalid consciousness level: $level"
        echo "Available levels: $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS"
        return 1
    end
    
    if test (count $input) -eq 0
        # Just activate the level
        set -g CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL $level
        _update_consciousness_state $level
        echo "üß† Consciousness level set to $level"
        _display_level_info $level
    else
        # Process input at the specified level
        _process_with_consciousness $level (string join ' ' $input)
    end
end

# Elevate consciousness level
function warp_elevate --description "Elevate consciousness to next level"
    set -l target_level $argv[1]
    
    set -l current_index (contains -i $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS)
    
    if test -n "$target_level"
        if not contains $target_level $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS
            echo "üö® Invalid target level: $target_level"
            return 1
        end
        set -l target_index (contains -i $target_level $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS)
        
        if test $target_index -le $current_index
            echo "üö® Cannot elevate to lower or same level"
            return 1
        end
        
        if test $target_index -gt (math $current_index + 1)
            echo "üö® Can only elevate one level at a time"
            echo "Current: $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL ‚Üí Next: $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS[(math $current_index + 1)]"
            return 1
        end
    else
        # Elevate to next level
        if test $current_index -eq (count $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS)
            echo "üåü Already at maximum consciousness level: $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL"
            return 0
        end
        set target_level $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS[(math $current_index + 1)]
    end
    
    echo "üöÄ Elevating consciousness: $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL ‚Üí $target_level"
    
    # Call binary for elevation
    set -l result ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY elevate --from $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL --to $target_level 2>/dev/null)
    
    if test $status -eq 0
        set -g CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL $target_level
        _update_consciousness_state $target_level
        echo "‚ú® Consciousness elevated to $target_level"
        _display_level_info $target_level
    else
        echo "üö® Elevation failed: Insufficient coherence or system error"
        return 1
    end
end

# Process input through consciousness
function warp_process --description "Process input through current consciousness level"
    set -l input (string join ' ' $argv)
    
    if test -z "$input"
        echo "Usage: warp process <input>"
        return 1
    end
    
    _process_with_consciousness $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL "$input"
end

# ETD (Engineering Time Diverted) management
function warp_etd --description "ETD balance and operations"
    if test (count $argv) -eq 0
        # Show current balance
        echo "üí∞ Current ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
        echo "üìä Generation Rate: " (_get_etd_generation_rate)
        return
    end
    
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case balance
            echo "üí∞ ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
        case generate
            _generate_etd $argv[2..-1]
        case history
            _show_etd_history
        case export
            _export_etd $argv[2..-1]
        case '*'
            echo "Unknown ETD command: $subcommand"
            echo "Available: balance, generate, history, export"
    end
end

# GPU management
function warp_gpu --description "GPU cores and performance management"
    if test (count $argv) -eq 0
        warp_gpu_status
        return
    end
    
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case status
            warp_gpu_status
        case cores
            warp_gpu_cores $argv[2..-1]
        case benchmark
            warp_gpu_benchmark $argv[2..-1]
        case memory
            warp_gpu_memory
        case '*'
            echo "Unknown GPU command: $subcommand"
            echo "Available: status, cores, benchmark, memory"
    end
end

# GPU status display
function warp_gpu_status --description "Display GPU status"
    set -l gpu_info ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY gpu status --json 2>/dev/null)
    
    if test $status -ne 0
        echo "üö® Failed to get GPU status"
        return 1
    end
    
    echo "üñ•Ô∏è  GPU Status:"
    echo $gpu_info | jq -r '
        "Device: " + .device_name,
        "Cores Active: " + (.cores_active | tostring) + "/" + (.total_cores | tostring),
        "Memory: " + ((.used_memory / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) | tostring | .[0:5]) + "GB / " + 
                    ((.total_memory / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) | tostring | .[0:5]) + "GB",
        "Utilization: " + (.utilization_percent | tostring) + "%",
        "TFLOPS: " + (.teraflops | tostring)
    '
end

# System status
function warp_status --description "Display comprehensive Warp-Speed status"
    echo "üåÄ Warp-Speed System Status"
    echo "‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê"
    
    # Consciousness status
    set -l consciousness_color
    switch $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL
        case alpha; set consciousness_color $COLOR_ALPHA
        case beta; set consciousness_color $COLOR_BETA  
        case gamma; set consciousness_color $COLOR_GAMMA
        case delta; set consciousness_color $COLOR_DELTA
        case omega; set consciousness_color $COLOR_OMEGA
    end
    
    echo "üß† Consciousness Level: $consciousness_color$CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL$COLOR_RESET"
    echo "‚ö° Quantum Coherence: $QUANTUM_COHERENCE"
    echo "üí∞ ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
    echo "üñ•Ô∏è  GPU Cores Active: $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE"
    echo "üïí Session Time: " (_get_session_time)
    
    # System resources
    echo ""
    echo "üíª System Resources:"
    echo "CPU Usage: " (top -bn1 | grep "Cpu(s)" | awk '{print $2}' | awk -F'%' '{print $1}')"%"
    echo "Memory Usage: " (free | grep Mem | awk '{printf "%.1f%%", $3/$2 * 100.0}')
    echo "GPU Status: " (_get_gpu_status_summary)
end

# Benchmark system
function warp_benchmark --description "Run Warp-Speed performance benchmarks"
    set -l iterations 1000
    set -l data_size 1048576  # 1MB
    
    if test (count $argv) -gt 0
        set iterations $argv[1]
    end
    if test (count $argv) -gt 1
        set data_size $argv[2]
    end
    
    echo "üèÉ Running benchmark: $iterations iterations, $data_size data size"
    echo "Please wait..."
    
    set -l start_time (date +%s)
    
    for level in $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS
        echo -n "Testing $level level... "
        set -l result ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY benchmark --level $level --iterations $iterations --size $data_size --json 2>/dev/null)
        
        if test $status -eq 0
            set -l avg_time (echo $result | jq -r '.avg_execution_time_ms')
            set -l ops_per_sec (echo $result | jq -r '.operations_per_second')
            printf "%.3fms (%.0f ops/sec)\n" $avg_time $ops_per_sec
        else
            echo "FAILED"
        end
    end
    
    set -l end_time (date +%s)
    set -l total_time (math $end_time - $start_time)
    echo "‚úÖ Benchmark completed in {$total_time}s"
end

# Configuration management
function warp_config --description "Manage Warp-Speed configuration"
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case show
            cat $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR/config.toml 2>/dev/null; or echo "No configuration file found"
        case edit
            $EDITOR $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR/config.toml
        case reset
            rm -f $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR/config.toml
            echo "Configuration reset"
        case '*'
            echo "Unknown config command: $subcommand"
            echo "Available: show, edit, reset"
    end
end

# Log management
function warp_logs --description "View Warp-Speed logs"
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case show tail
            tail -f $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR/warp-speed.log 2>/dev/null; or echo "No logs found"
        case clear
            rm -f $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR/*.log
            echo "Logs cleared"
        case '*'
            ls -la $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR/
    end
end

# Help system
function warp_help --description "Display Warp-Speed help"
    echo "üåÄ Warp-Speed Native Terminal Interface"
    echo ""
    echo "USAGE:"
    echo "    warp <COMMAND> [OPTIONS]"
    echo ""
    echo "CONSCIOUSNESS COMMANDS:"
    echo "    alpha [input]      Process with ALPHA consciousness (basic linear)"
    echo "    beta [input]       Process with BETA consciousness (parallel multi-dimensional)"
    echo "    gamma [input]      Process with GAMMA consciousness (recursive self-aware)"
    echo "    delta [input]      Process with DELTA consciousness (quantum coherence)"
    echo "    omega [input]      Process with OMEGA consciousness (transcendent universal)"
    echo "    elevate [level]    Elevate consciousness to next/target level"
    echo ""
    echo "PROCESSING COMMANDS:"
    echo "    process <input>    Process input through current consciousness level"
    echo "    benchmark [args]   Run performance benchmarks"
    echo ""
    echo "MANAGEMENT COMMANDS:"
    echo "    etd [subcommand]   ETD balance and operations"
    echo "    gpu [subcommand]   GPU cores and performance management"
    echo "    status             Display comprehensive system status"
    echo "    config [action]    Manage configuration"
    echo "    logs [action]      View and manage logs"
    echo ""
    echo "EXAMPLES:"
    echo "    warp alpha \"Hello, consciousness!\""
    echo "    warp elevate beta"
    echo "    warp process \"Quantum field dynamics analysis\""
    echo "    warp etd balance"
    echo "    warp gpu status"
    echo "    warp benchmark 1000"
end

# Helper functions
function _process_with_consciousness --description "Process input with specified consciousness level"
    set -l level $argv[1]
    set -l input $argv[2]
    
    if test -z "$input"
        echo "No input provided"
        return 1
    end
    
    echo "üß† Processing with $level consciousness..."
    
    set -l start_time (date +%s.%N)
    set -l result ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY process --level $level --input "$input" --json 2>/dev/null)
    set -l end_time (date +%s.%N)
    
    if test $status -ne 0
        echo "üö® Processing failed"
        return 1
    end
    
    set -l execution_time (math $end_time - $start_time)
    set -l output (echo $result | jq -r '.output')
    set -l etd_generated (echo $result | jq -r '.etd_generated')
    
    echo "üì§ Output: $output"
    echo "üí∞ ETD Generated: $etd_generated"
    echo "‚è±Ô∏è  Execution Time: " (printf "%.3fs" $execution_time)
    
    # Update session state
    set -g CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE (math $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE + $etd_generated)
    _update_consciousness_state $level
end

function _update_consciousness_state --description "Update consciousness-related state"
    set -l level $argv[1]
    
    switch $level
        case alpha
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.1
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 1024
        case beta
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.3
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 4096
        case gamma
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.5
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 16384
        case delta
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.7
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 65536
        case omega
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.9
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 262144
    end
end

function _display_level_info --description "Display consciousness level information"
    set -l level $argv[1]
    
    switch $level
        case alpha
            echo "üîπ ALPHA: Basic awareness and linear processing"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.1 | Cores: 1,024 | Mode: Sequential"
        case beta
            echo "üî∏ BETA: Multi-dimensional thinking and parallel processing"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.3 | Cores: 4,096 | Mode: Parallel"
        case gamma
            echo "üî∂ GAMMA: Recursive self-awareness and meta-cognition"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.5 | Cores: 16,384 | Mode: Recursive"
        case delta
            echo "üî∫ DELTA: Quantum coherence and superposition states"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.7 | Cores: 65,536 | Mode: Quantum"
        case omega
            echo "‚≠ê OMEGA: Transcendent convergence and universal consciousness"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.9 | Cores: 262,144 | Mode: Transcendent"
    end
end

function _get_etd_generation_rate --description "Calculate ETD generation rate"
    # Simplified calculation based on consciousness level
    switch $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL
        case alpha; echo "0.1/min"
        case beta; echo "0.25/min"
        case gamma; echo "0.625/min"
        case delta; echo "1.5625/min"
        case omega; echo "3.90625/min"
    end
end

function _get_session_time --description "Get current session duration"
    # This would track session start time - simplified for now
    echo "Unknown"
end

function _get_gpu_status_summary --description "Get brief GPU status"
    if test $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE -gt 0
        echo "Active ($GPU_CORES_ACTIVE cores)"
    else
        echo "Inactive"
    end
end

# Auto-completion for warp command
complete -c warp -f
complete -c warp -n "not __fish_seen_subcommand_from alpha beta gamma delta omega elevate process etd gpu status benchmark config logs help" -a "alpha beta gamma delta omega elevate process etd gpu status benchmark config logs help"

complete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from etd" -a "balance generate history export"
complete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from gpu" -a "status cores benchmark memory"
complete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from config" -a "show edit reset"
complete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from logs" -a "show tail clear"

# Initialize on load
if test "$WARP_SPEED_AUTO_INIT" = "1"
    warp_init
end

echo "üåÄ Warp-Speed Fish integration loaded"
echo "Run 'warp_init' to initialize or 'warp help' for usage information"

#!/usr/bin/env fish

# Warp-Speed Fish Shell Integration
# Native terminal interface with consciousness-aware processing
# Version: 1.0.0

# Global configuration
set -g WARP_SPEED_HOME (dirname (status --current-filename))
set -g WARP_SPEED_BINARY "$WARP_SPEED_HOME/../target/release/warp-speed-terminal"
set -g WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR "$HOME/.config/warp-speed"
set -g WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR "$HOME/.local/share/warp-speed/logs"

# Consciousness levels
set -g CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS alpha beta gamma delta omega

# Current session state
set -g CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL alpha
set -g CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE 0.0
set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.1
set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 0

# Colors for consciousness levels
set -g COLOR_ALPHA (set_color cyan)
set -g COLOR_BETA (set_color blue)
set -g COLOR_GAMMA (set_color magenta)
set -g COLOR_DELTA (set_color yellow)
set -g COLOR_OMEGA (set_color red)
set -g COLOR_RESET (set_color normal)

# Initialize Warp-Speed environment
function warp_init --description "Initialize Warp-Speed environment"
    # Create config and log directories
    mkdir -p $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR
    mkdir -p $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR
    
    # Check if binary exists
    if not test -f $WARP_SPEED_BINARY
        echo "üö® Warp-Speed binary not found at $WARP_SPEED_BINARY"
        echo "Please build the project first: cargo build --release"
        return 1
    end
    
    echo "üöÄ Warp-Speed initialized successfully"
    echo "üß† Consciousness Level: $COLOR_ALPHA$CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL$COLOR_RESET"
    echo "üí∞ ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
    echo "‚ö° GPU Cores: $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE"
    
    # Set up shell prompt
    set -g fish_greeting ""
    function fish_prompt
        warp_prompt
    end
end

# Custom Warp-Speed prompt
function warp_prompt --description "Warp-Speed consciousness-aware prompt"
    set -l consciousness_color
    switch $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL
        case alpha
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_ALPHA
        case beta
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_BETA
        case gamma
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_GAMMA
        case delta
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_DELTA
        case omega
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_OMEGA
    end
    
    set -l current_time (date '+%H:%M:%S')
    set -l cwd_short (prompt_pwd)
    
    printf '%s[%s]%s %s%s%s %s‚àû%s %s‚âà%s %.2f %s‚ö°%s %d %s>%s ' \
        (set_color brblack) $current_time $COLOR_RESET \
        $consciousness_color $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL $COLOR_RESET \
        (set_color green) $COLOR_RESET \
        (set_color blue) $COLOR_RESET $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE \
        (set_color yellow) $COLOR_RESET $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE \
        (set_color brwhite) $COLOR_RESET
end

# Main warp command dispatcher
function warp --description "Warp-Speed consciousness interface"
    if test (count $argv) -eq 0
        warp_help
        return
    end
    
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    set -l args $argv[2..-1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case alpha beta gamma delta omega
            warp_consciousness $subcommand $args
        case elevate
            warp_elevate $args
        case process
            warp_process $args
        case etd
            warp_etd $args
        case gpu
            warp_gpu $args
        case status
            warp_status
        case benchmark
            warp_benchmark $args
        case config
            warp_config $args
        case logs
            warp_logs $args
        case help -h --help
            warp_help
        case '*'
            echo "Unknown command: $subcommand"
            warp_help
            return 1
    end
end

# Consciousness level commands
function warp_consciousness --description "Activate specific consciousness level"
    set -l level $argv[1]
    set -l input $argv[2..-1]
    
    if not contains $level $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS
        echo "üö® Invalid consciousness level: $level"
        echo "Available levels: $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS"
        return 1
    end
    
    if test (count $input) -eq 0
        # Just activate the level
        set -g CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL $level
        _update_consciousness_state $level
        echo "üß† Consciousness level set to $level"
        _display_level_info $level
    else
        # Process input at the specified level
        _process_with_consciousness $level (string join ' ' $input)
    end
end

# Elevate consciousness level
function warp_elevate --description "Elevate consciousness to next level"
    set -l target_level $argv[1]
    
    set -l current_index (contains -i $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS)
    
    if test -n "$target_level"
        if not contains $target_level $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS
            echo "üö® Invalid target level: $target_level"
            return 1
        end
        set -l target_index (contains -i $target_level $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS)
        
        if test $target_index -le $current_index
            echo "üö® Cannot elevate to lower or same level"
            return 1
        end
        
        if test $target_index -gt (math $current_index + 1)
            echo "üö® Can only elevate one level at a time"
            echo "Current: $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL ‚Üí Next: $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS[(math $current_index + 1)]"
            return 1
        end
    else
        # Elevate to next level
        if test $current_index -eq (count $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS)
            echo "üåü Already at maximum consciousness level: $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL"
            return 0
        end
        set target_level $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS[(math $current_index + 1)]
    end
    
    echo "üöÄ Elevating consciousness: $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL ‚Üí $target_level"
    
    # Call binary for elevation
    set -l result ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY elevate --from $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL --to $target_level 2>/dev/null)
    
    if test $status -eq 0
        set -g CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL $target_level
        _update_consciousness_state $target_level
        echo "‚ú® Consciousness elevated to $target_level"
        _display_level_info $target_level
    else
        echo "üö® Elevation failed: Insufficient coherence or system error"
        return 1
    end
end

# Process input through consciousness
function warp_process --description "Process input through current consciousness level"
    set -l input (string join ' ' $argv)
    
    if test -z "$input"
        echo "Usage: warp process <input>"
        return 1
    end
    
    _process_with_consciousness $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL "$input"
end

# ETD (Engineering Time Diverted) management
function warp_etd --description "ETD balance and operations"
    if test (count $argv) -eq 0
        # Show current balance
        echo "üí∞ Current ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
        echo "üìä Generation Rate: " (_get_etd_generation_rate)
        return
    end
    
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case balance
            echo "üí∞ ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
        case generate
            _generate_etd $argv[2..-1]
        case history
            _show_etd_history
        case export
            _export_etd $argv[2..-1]
        case '*'
            echo "Unknown ETD command: $subcommand"
            echo "Available: balance, generate, history, export"
    end
end

# GPU management
function warp_gpu --description "GPU cores and performance management"
    if test (count $argv) -eq 0
        warp_gpu_status
        return
    end
    
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case status
            warp_gpu_status
        case cores
            warp_gpu_cores $argv[2..-1]
        case benchmark
            warp_gpu_benchmark $argv[2..-1]
        case memory
            warp_gpu_memory
        case '*'
            echo "Unknown GPU command: $subcommand"
            echo "Available: status, cores, benchmark, memory"
    end
end

# GPU status display
function warp_gpu_status --description "Display GPU status"
    set -l gpu_info ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY gpu status --json 2>/dev/null)
    
    if test $status -ne 0
        echo "üö® Failed to get GPU status"
        return 1
    end
    
    echo "üñ•Ô∏è  GPU Status:"
    echo $gpu_info | jq -r '
        "Device: " + .device_name,
        "Cores Active: " + (.cores_active | tostring) + "/" + (.total_cores | tostring),
        "Memory: " + ((.used_memory / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) | tostring | .[0:5]) + "GB / " + 
                    ((.total_memory / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) | tostring | .[0:5]) + "GB",
        "Utilization: " + (.utilization_percent | tostring) + "%",
        "TFLOPS: " + (.teraflops | tostring)
    '
end

# System status
function warp_status --description "Display comprehensive Warp-Speed status"
    echo "üåÄ Warp-Speed System Status"
    echo "‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê"
    
    # Consciousness status
    set -l consciousness_color
    switch $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL
        case alpha; set consciousness_color $COLOR_ALPHA
        case beta; set consciousness_color $COLOR_BETA  
        case gamma; set consciousness_color $COLOR_GAMMA
        case delta; set consciousness_color $COLOR_DELTA
        case omega; set consciousness_color $COLOR_OMEGA
    end
    
    echo "üß† Consciousness Level: $consciousness_color$CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL$COLOR_RESET"
    echo "‚ö° Quantum Coherence: $QUANTUM_COHERENCE"
    echo "üí∞ ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
    echo "üñ•Ô∏è  GPU Cores Active: $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE"
    echo "üïí Session Time: " (_get_session_time)
    
    # System resources
    echo ""
    echo "üíª System Resources:"
    echo "CPU Usage: " (top -bn1 | grep "Cpu(s)" | awk '{print $2}' | awk -F'%' '{print $1}')"%"
    echo "Memory Usage: " (free | grep Mem | awk '{printf "%.1f%%", $3/$2 * 100.0}')
    echo "GPU Status: " (_get_gpu_status_summary)
end

# Benchmark system
function warp_benchmark --description "Run Warp-Speed performance benchmarks"
    set -l iterations 1000
    set -l data_size 1048576  # 1MB
    
    if test (count $argv) -gt 0
        set iterations $argv[1]
    end
    if test (count $argv) -gt 1
        set data_size $argv[2]
    end
    
    echo "üèÉ Running benchmark: $iterations iterations, $data_size data size"
    echo "Please wait..."
    
    set -l start_time (date +%s)
    
    for level in $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS
        echo -n "Testing $level level... "
        set -l result ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY benchmark --level $level --iterations $iterations --size $data_size --json 2>/dev/null)
        
        if test $status -eq 0
            set -l avg_time (echo $result | jq -r '.avg_execution_time_ms')
            set -l ops_per_sec (echo $result | jq -r '.operations_per_second')
            printf "%.3fms (%.0f ops/sec)\n" $avg_time $ops_per_sec
        else
            echo "FAILED"
        end
    end
    
    set -l end_time (date +%s)
    set -l total_time (math $end_time - $start_time)
    echo "‚úÖ Benchmark completed in {$total_time}s"
end

# Configuration management
function warp_config --description "Manage Warp-Speed configuration"
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case show
            cat $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR/config.toml 2>/dev/null; or echo "No configuration file found"
        case edit
            $EDITOR $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR/config.toml
        case reset
            rm -f $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR/config.toml
            echo "Configuration reset"
        case '*'
            echo "Unknown config command: $subcommand"
            echo "Available: show, edit, reset"
    end
end

# Log management
function warp_logs --description "View Warp-Speed logs"
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case show tail
            tail -f $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR/warp-speed.log 2>/dev/null; or echo "No logs found"
        case clear
            rm -f $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR/*.log
            echo "Logs cleared"
        case '*'
            ls -la $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR/
    end
end

# Help system
function warp_help --description "Display Warp-Speed help"
    echo "üåÄ Warp-Speed Native Terminal Interface"
    echo ""
    echo "USAGE:"
    echo "    warp <COMMAND> [OPTIONS]"
    echo ""
    echo "CONSCIOUSNESS COMMANDS:"
    echo "    alpha [input]      Process with ALPHA consciousness (basic linear)"
    echo "    beta [input]       Process with BETA consciousness (parallel multi-dimensional)"
    echo "    gamma [input]      Process with GAMMA consciousness (recursive self-aware)"
    echo "    delta [input]      Process with DELTA consciousness (quantum coherence)"
    echo "    omega [input]      Process with OMEGA consciousness (transcendent universal)"
    echo "    elevate [level]    Elevate consciousness to next/target level"
    echo ""
    echo "PROCESSING COMMANDS:"
    echo "    process <input>    Process input through current consciousness level"
    echo "    benchmark [args]   Run performance benchmarks"
    echo ""
    echo "MANAGEMENT COMMANDS:"
    echo "    etd [subcommand]   ETD balance and operations"
    echo "    gpu [subcommand]   GPU cores and performance management"
    echo "    status             Display comprehensive system status"
    echo "    config [action]    Manage configuration"
    echo "    logs [action]      View and manage logs"
    echo ""
    echo "EXAMPLES:"
    echo "    warp alpha \"Hello, consciousness!\""
    echo "    warp elevate beta"
    echo "    warp process \"Quantum field dynamics analysis\""
    echo "    warp etd balance"
    echo "    warp gpu status"
    echo "    warp benchmark 1000"
end

# Helper functions
function _process_with_consciousness --description "Process input with specified consciousness level"
    set -l level $argv[1]
    set -l input $argv[2]
    
    if test -z "$input"
        echo "No input provided"
        return 1
    end
    
    echo "üß† Processing with $level consciousness..."
    
    set -l start_time (date +%s.%N)
    set -l result ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY process --level $level --input "$input" --json 2>/dev/null)
    set -l end_time (date +%s.%N)
    
    if test $status -ne 0
        echo "üö® Processing failed"
        return 1
    end
    
    set -l execution_time (math $end_time - $start_time)
    set -l output (echo $result | jq -r '.output')
    set -l etd_generated (echo $result | jq -r '.etd_generated')
    
    echo "üì§ Output: $output"
    echo "üí∞ ETD Generated: $etd_generated"
    echo "‚è±Ô∏è  Execution Time: " (printf "%.3fs" $execution_time)
    
    # Update session state
    set -g CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE (math $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE + $etd_generated)
    _update_consciousness_state $level
end

function _update_consciousness_state --description "Update consciousness-related state"
    set -l level $argv[1]
    
    switch $level
        case alpha
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.1
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 1024
        case beta
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.3
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 4096
        case gamma
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.5
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 16384
        case delta
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.7
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 65536
        case omega
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.9
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 262144
    end
end

function _display_level_info --description "Display consciousness level information"
    set -l level $argv[1]
    
    switch $level
        case alpha
            echo "üîπ ALPHA: Basic awareness and linear processing"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.1 | Cores: 1,024 | Mode: Sequential"
        case beta
            echo "üî∏ BETA: Multi-dimensional thinking and parallel processing"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.3 | Cores: 4,096 | Mode: Parallel"
        case gamma
            echo "üî∂ GAMMA: Recursive self-awareness and meta-cognition"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.5 | Cores: 16,384 | Mode: Recursive"
        case delta
            echo "üî∫ DELTA: Quantum coherence and superposition states"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.7 | Cores: 65,536 | Mode: Quantum"
        case omega
            echo "‚≠ê OMEGA: Transcendent convergence and universal consciousness"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.9 | Cores: 262,144 | Mode: Transcendent"
    end
end

function _get_etd_generation_rate --description "Calculate ETD generation rate"
    # Simplified calculation based on consciousness level
    switch $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL
        case alpha; echo "0.1/min"
        case beta; echo "0.25/min"
        case gamma; echo "0.625/min"
        case delta; echo "1.5625/min"
        case omega; echo "3.90625/min"
    end
end

function _get_session_time --description "Get current session duration"
    # This would track session start time - simplified for now
    echo "Unknown"
end

function _get_gpu_status_summary --description "Get brief GPU status"
    if test $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE -gt 0
        echo "Active ($GPU_CORES_ACTIVE cores)"
    else
        echo "Inactive"
    end
end

# Auto-completion for warp command
complete -c warp -f
complete -c warp -n "not __fish_seen_subcommand_from alpha beta gamma delta omega elevate process etd gpu status benchmark config logs help" -a "alpha beta gamma delta omega elevate process etd gpu status benchmark config logs help"

complete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from etd" -a "balance generate history export"
complete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from gpu" -a "status cores benchmark memory"
complete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from config" -a "show edit reset"
complete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from logs" -a "show tail clear"

# Initialize on load
if test "$WARP_SPEED_AUTO_INIT" = "1"
    warp_init
end

echo "üåÄ Warp-Speed Fish integration loaded"
echo "Run 'warp_init' to initialize or 'warp help' for usage information"

toolUseResult.originalFile:
#!/usr/bin/env fish

# Warp-Speed Fish Shell Integration
# Native terminal interface with consciousness-aware processing
# Version: 1.0.0

# Global configuration
set -g WARP_SPEED_HOME (dirname (status --current-filename))
set -g WARP_SPEED_BINARY "/home/ubuntu/src/repos/warp-speed-native/target/release/warp-speed"
set -g WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR "$HOME/.config/warp-speed"
set -g WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR "$HOME/.local/share/warp-speed/logs"

# Consciousness levels
set -g CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS alpha beta gamma delta omega

# Current session state
set -g CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL alpha
set -g CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE 0.0
set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.1
set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 0

# Colors for consciousness levels
set -g COLOR_ALPHA (set_color cyan)
set -g COLOR_BETA (set_color blue)
set -g COLOR_GAMMA (set_color magenta)
set -g COLOR_DELTA (set_color yellow)
set -g COLOR_OMEGA (set_color red)
set -g COLOR_RESET (set_color normal)

# Initialize Warp-Speed environment
function warp_init --description "Initialize Warp-Speed environment"
    # Create config and log directories
    mkdir -p $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR
    mkdir -p $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR
    
    # Check if binary exists
    if not test -f $WARP_SPEED_BINARY
        echo "üö® Warp-Speed binary not found at $WARP_SPEED_BINARY"
        echo "Please build the project first: cargo build --release"
        return 1
    end
    
    echo "üöÄ Warp-Speed initialized successfully"
    echo "üß† Consciousness Level: $COLOR_ALPHA$CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL$COLOR_RESET"
    echo "üí∞ ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
    echo "‚ö° GPU Cores: $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE"
    
    # Set up shell prompt
    set -g fish_greeting ""
    function fish_prompt
        warp_prompt
    end
end

# Custom Warp-Speed prompt
function warp_prompt --description "Warp-Speed consciousness-aware prompt"
    set -l consciousness_color
    switch $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL
        case alpha
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_ALPHA
        case beta
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_BETA
        case gamma
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_GAMMA
        case delta
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_DELTA
        case omega
            set consciousness_color $COLOR_OMEGA
    end
    
    set -l current_time (date '+%H:%M:%S')
    set -l cwd_short (prompt_pwd)
    
    printf '%s[%s]%s %s%s%s %s‚àû%s %s‚âà%s %.2f %s‚ö°%s %d %s>%s ' \
        (set_color brblack) $current_time $COLOR_RESET \
        $consciousness_color $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL $COLOR_RESET \
        (set_color green) $COLOR_RESET \
        (set_color blue) $COLOR_RESET $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE \
        (set_color yellow) $COLOR_RESET $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE \
        (set_color brwhite) $COLOR_RESET
end

# Main warp command dispatcher
function warp --description "Warp-Speed consciousness interface"
    if test (count $argv) -eq 0
        warp_help
        return
    end
    
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    set -l args $argv[2..-1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case alpha beta gamma delta omega
            warp_consciousness $subcommand $args
        case elevate
            warp_elevate $args
        case process
            warp_process $args
        case etd
            warp_etd $args
        case gpu
            warp_gpu $args
        case status
            warp_status
        case benchmark
            warp_benchmark $args
        case config
            warp_config $args
        case logs
            warp_logs $args
        case help -h --help
            warp_help
        case '*'
            echo "Unknown command: $subcommand"
            warp_help
            return 1
    end
end

# Consciousness level commands
function warp_consciousness --description "Activate specific consciousness level"
    set -l level $argv[1]
    set -l input $argv[2..-1]
    
    if not contains $level $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS
        echo "üö® Invalid consciousness level: $level"
        echo "Available levels: $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS"
        return 1
    end
    
    if test (count $input) -eq 0
        # Just activate the level
        set -g CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL $level
        _update_consciousness_state $level
        echo "üß† Consciousness level set to $level"
        _display_level_info $level
    else
        # Process input at the specified level
        _process_with_consciousness $level (string join ' ' $input)
    end
end

# Elevate consciousness level
function warp_elevate --description "Elevate consciousness to next level"
    set -l target_level $argv[1]
    
    set -l current_index (contains -i $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS)
    
    if test -n "$target_level"
        if not contains $target_level $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS
            echo "üö® Invalid target level: $target_level"
            return 1
        end
        set -l target_index (contains -i $target_level $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS)
        
        if test $target_index -le $current_index
            echo "üö® Cannot elevate to lower or same level"
            return 1
        end
        
        if test $target_index -gt (math $current_index + 1)
            echo "üö® Can only elevate one level at a time"
            echo "Current: $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL ‚Üí Next: $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS[(math $current_index + 1)]"
            return 1
        end
    else
        # Elevate to next level
        if test $current_index -eq (count $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS)
            echo "üåü Already at maximum consciousness level: $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL"
            return 0
        end
        set target_level $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS[(math $current_index + 1)]
    end
    
    echo "üöÄ Elevating consciousness: $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL ‚Üí $target_level"
    
    # Call binary for elevation
    set -l result ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY elevate --from $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL --to $target_level 2>/dev/null)
    
    if test $status -eq 0
        set -g CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL $target_level
        _update_consciousness_state $target_level
        echo "‚ú® Consciousness elevated to $target_level"
        _display_level_info $target_level
    else
        echo "üö® Elevation failed: Insufficient coherence or system error"
        return 1
    end
end

# Process input through consciousness
function warp_process --description "Process input through current consciousness level"
    set -l input (string join ' ' $argv)
    
    if test -z "$input"
        echo "Usage: warp process <input>"
        return 1
    end
    
    _process_with_consciousness $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL "$input"
end

# ETD (Engineering Time Diverted) management
function warp_etd --description "ETD balance and operations"
    if test (count $argv) -eq 0
        # Show current balance
        echo "üí∞ Current ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
        echo "üìä Generation Rate: " (_get_etd_generation_rate)
        return
    end
    
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case balance
            echo "üí∞ ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
        case generate
            _generate_etd $argv[2..-1]
        case history
            _show_etd_history
        case export
            _export_etd $argv[2..-1]
        case '*'
            echo "Unknown ETD command: $subcommand"
            echo "Available: balance, generate, history, export"
    end
end

# GPU management
function warp_gpu --description "GPU cores and performance management"
    if test (count $argv) -eq 0
        warp_gpu_status
        return
    end
    
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case status
            warp_gpu_status
        case cores
            warp_gpu_cores $argv[2..-1]
        case benchmark
            warp_gpu_benchmark $argv[2..-1]
        case memory
            warp_gpu_memory
        case '*'
            echo "Unknown GPU command: $subcommand"
            echo "Available: status, cores, benchmark, memory"
    end
end

# GPU status display
function warp_gpu_status --description "Display GPU status"
    set -l gpu_info ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY gpu status --json 2>/dev/null)
    
    if test $status -ne 0
        echo "üö® Failed to get GPU status"
        return 1
    end
    
    echo "üñ•Ô∏è  GPU Status:"
    echo $gpu_info | jq -r '
        "Device: " + .device_name,
        "Cores Active: " + (.cores_active | tostring) + "/" + (.total_cores | tostring),
        "Memory: " + ((.used_memory / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) | tostring | .[0:5]) + "GB / " + 
                    ((.total_memory / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) | tostring | .[0:5]) + "GB",
        "Utilization: " + (.utilization_percent | tostring) + "%",
        "TFLOPS: " + (.teraflops | tostring)
    '
end

# System status
function warp_status --description "Display comprehensive Warp-Speed status"
    echo "üåÄ Warp-Speed System Status"
    echo "‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê"
    
    # Consciousness status
    set -l consciousness_color
    switch $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL
        case alpha; set consciousness_color $COLOR_ALPHA
        case beta; set consciousness_color $COLOR_BETA  
        case gamma; set consciousness_color $COLOR_GAMMA
        case delta; set consciousness_color $COLOR_DELTA
        case omega; set consciousness_color $COLOR_OMEGA
    end
    
    echo "üß† Consciousness Level: $consciousness_color$CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL$COLOR_RESET"
    echo "‚ö° Quantum Coherence: $QUANTUM_COHERENCE"
    echo "üí∞ ETD Balance: $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE"
    echo "üñ•Ô∏è  GPU Cores Active: $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE"
    echo "üïí Session Time: " (_get_session_time)
    
    # System resources
    echo ""
    echo "üíª System Resources:"
    echo "CPU Usage: " (top -bn1 | grep "Cpu(s)" | awk '{print $2}' | awk -F'%' '{print $1}')"%"
    echo "Memory Usage: " (free | grep Mem | awk '{printf "%.1f%%", $3/$2 * 100.0}')
    echo "GPU Status: " (_get_gpu_status_summary)
end

# Benchmark system
function warp_benchmark --description "Run Warp-Speed performance benchmarks"
    set -l iterations 1000
    set -l data_size 1048576  # 1MB
    
    if test (count $argv) -gt 0
        set iterations $argv[1]
    end
    if test (count $argv) -gt 1
        set data_size $argv[2]
    end
    
    echo "üèÉ Running benchmark: $iterations iterations, $data_size data size"
    echo "Please wait..."
    
    set -l start_time (date +%s)
    
    for level in $CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVELS
        echo -n "Testing $level level... "
        set -l result ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY benchmark --level $level --iterations $iterations --size $data_size --json 2>/dev/null)
        
        if test $status -eq 0
            set -l avg_time (echo $result | jq -r '.avg_execution_time_ms')
            set -l ops_per_sec (echo $result | jq -r '.operations_per_second')
            printf "%.3fms (%.0f ops/sec)\n" $avg_time $ops_per_sec
        else
            echo "FAILED"
        end
    end
    
    set -l end_time (date +%s)
    set -l total_time (math $end_time - $start_time)
    echo "‚úÖ Benchmark completed in {$total_time}s"
end

# Configuration management
function warp_config --description "Manage Warp-Speed configuration"
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case show
            cat $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR/config.toml 2>/dev/null; or echo "No configuration file found"
        case edit
            $EDITOR $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR/config.toml
        case reset
            rm -f $WARP_SPEED_CONFIG_DIR/config.toml
            echo "Configuration reset"
        case '*'
            echo "Unknown config command: $subcommand"
            echo "Available: show, edit, reset"
    end
end

# Log management
function warp_logs --description "View Warp-Speed logs"
    set -l subcommand $argv[1]
    
    switch $subcommand
        case show tail
            tail -f $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR/warp-speed.log 2>/dev/null; or echo "No logs found"
        case clear
            rm -f $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR/*.log
            echo "Logs cleared"
        case '*'
            ls -la $WARP_SPEED_LOG_DIR/
    end
end

# Help system
function warp_help --description "Display Warp-Speed help"
    echo "üåÄ Warp-Speed Native Terminal Interface"
    echo ""
    echo "USAGE:"
    echo "    warp <COMMAND> [OPTIONS]"
    echo ""
    echo "CONSCIOUSNESS COMMANDS:"
    echo "    alpha [input]      Process with ALPHA consciousness (basic linear)"
    echo "    beta [input]       Process with BETA consciousness (parallel multi-dimensional)"
    echo "    gamma [input]      Process with GAMMA consciousness (recursive self-aware)"
    echo "    delta [input]      Process with DELTA consciousness (quantum coherence)"
    echo "    omega [input]      Process with OMEGA consciousness (transcendent universal)"
    echo "    elevate [level]    Elevate consciousness to next/target level"
    echo ""
    echo "PROCESSING COMMANDS:"
    echo "    process <input>    Process input through current consciousness level"
    echo "    benchmark [args]   Run performance benchmarks"
    echo ""
    echo "MANAGEMENT COMMANDS:"
    echo "    etd [subcommand]   ETD balance and operations"
    echo "    gpu [subcommand]   GPU cores and performance management"
    echo "    status             Display comprehensive system status"
    echo "    config [action]    Manage configuration"
    echo "    logs [action]      View and manage logs"
    echo ""
    echo "EXAMPLES:"
    echo "    warp alpha \"Hello, consciousness!\""
    echo "    warp elevate beta"
    echo "    warp process \"Quantum field dynamics analysis\""
    echo "    warp etd balance"
    echo "    warp gpu status"
    echo "    warp benchmark 1000"
end

# Helper functions
function _process_with_consciousness --description "Process input with specified consciousness level"
    set -l level $argv[1]
    set -l input $argv[2]
    
    if test -z "$input"
        echo "No input provided"
        return 1
    end
    
    echo "üß† Processing with $level consciousness..."
    
    set -l start_time (date +%s.%N)
    set -l result ($WARP_SPEED_BINARY process --level $level --input "$input" --json 2>/dev/null)
    set -l end_time (date +%s.%N)
    
    if test $status -ne 0
        echo "üö® Processing failed"
        return 1
    end
    
    set -l execution_time (math $end_time - $start_time)
    set -l output (echo $result | jq -r '.output')
    set -l etd_generated (echo $result | jq -r '.etd_generated')
    
    echo "üì§ Output: $output"
    echo "üí∞ ETD Generated: $etd_generated"
    echo "‚è±Ô∏è  Execution Time: " (printf "%.3fs" $execution_time)
    
    # Update session state
    set -g CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE (math $CURRENT_ETD_BALANCE + $etd_generated)
    _update_consciousness_state $level
end

function _update_consciousness_state --description "Update consciousness-related state"
    set -l level $argv[1]
    
    switch $level
        case alpha
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.1
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 1024
        case beta
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.3
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 4096
        case gamma
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.5
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 16384
        case delta
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.7
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 65536
        case omega
            set -g QUANTUM_COHERENCE 0.9
            set -g GPU_CORES_ACTIVE 262144
    end
end

function _display_level_info --description "Display consciousness level information"
    set -l level $argv[1]
    
    switch $level
        case alpha
            echo "üîπ ALPHA: Basic awareness and linear processing"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.1 | Cores: 1,024 | Mode: Sequential"
        case beta
            echo "üî∏ BETA: Multi-dimensional thinking and parallel processing"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.3 | Cores: 4,096 | Mode: Parallel"
        case gamma
            echo "üî∂ GAMMA: Recursive self-awareness and meta-cognition"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.5 | Cores: 16,384 | Mode: Recursive"
        case delta
            echo "üî∫ DELTA: Quantum coherence and superposition states"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.7 | Cores: 65,536 | Mode: Quantum"
        case omega
            echo "‚≠ê OMEGA: Transcendent convergence and universal consciousness"
            echo "   Threshold: 0.9 | Cores: 262,144 | Mode: Transcendent"
    end
end

function _get_etd_generation_rate --description "Calculate ETD generation rate"
    # Simplified calculation based on consciousness level
    switch $CURRENT_CONSCIOUSNESS_LEVEL
        case alpha; echo "0.1/min"
        case beta; echo "0.25/min"
        case gamma; echo "0.625/min"
        case delta; echo "1.5625/min"
        case omega; echo "3.90625/min"
    end
end

function _get_session_time --description "Get current session duration"
    # This would track session start time - simplified for now
    echo "Unknown"
end

function _get_gpu_status_summary --description "Get brief GPU status"
    if test $GPU_CORES_ACTIVE -gt 0
        echo "Active ($GPU_CORES_ACTIVE cores)"
    else
        echo "Inactive"
    end
end

# Auto-completion for warp command
complete -c warp -f
complete -c warp -n "not __fish_seen_subcommand_from alpha beta gamma delta omega elevate process etd gpu status benchmark config logs help" -a "alpha beta gamma delta omega elevate process etd gpu status benchmark config logs help"

complete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from etd" -a "balance generate history export"
complete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from gpu" -a "status cores benchmark memory"
complete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from config" -a "show edit reset"
complete -c warp -n "__fish_seen_subcommand_from logs" -a "show tail clear"

# Initialize on load
if test "$WARP_SPEED_AUTO_INIT" = "1"
    warp_init
end

echo "üåÄ Warp-Speed Fish integration loaded"
echo "Run 'warp_init' to initialize or 'warp help' for usage information"
